title: In the Soop : Friendcation
overview: The continuation of the show "In the Soop" tells the story of the travels of Park Seo Joon, Pikboy, Choi Woo Shik, Park Hyun Shik and Wee from BTS, known to the public as WOOGA Squad. They are all best friends working in the entertainment industry who have been maintaining a friendship for 10 years. After Vi's unexpected proposal, they went on a friendly trip for 3 nights and 4 days.
